thread.title: English FA receive €15000 fine with Lithuania penalised double for crowd trouble
thread.title_full: English FA receive €15000 fine with Lithuania penalised double for crowd trouble

title: English FA receive €15000 fine with Lithuania penalised double for crowd trouble
text:
English FA receive €15,000 fine, with Lithuania penalised double for crowd trouble 
Breaking News.ie Saturday 24th October, 2015 
The crowd disturbances during England's final Euro 2016 qualifier against Lithuania have seen the Football Association hit with a EUR15,000 fine and the hosts handed double that punishment by UEFA.Roy Hodgson's men entered the record books by completing European Championship qualification with a 100 per cent record last Monday, although fighting in the stands somewhat overshadowed the 3-0 win in Vilnius.England fans became embroiled in nasty scuffles with home supporters, leading UEFA to fine the FA a fine of 15,000 euros and the Lithuanian Football Federation EUR30,000....
